    • Method Detail

      • getRound

        public int getRound()
        Getter to get the current round of the game
        Returns:
        current game round

      • setRoad

        public void setRoad​(Road currRoad)
        Setter to set the model's road to currRoad
        Parameters:
        currRoad - - Road object that will be the model's road

      • getGamePhase

        public java.lang.String getGamePhase()
        Getter to get the current game phase
        Returns:
        the game phase

      • increaseGameSpeed

        public void increaseGameSpeed()
        Method to increase the speed of the game and loop around back to the original speed

      • changePaused

        public void changePaused()
        Method to change the current status of the game being paused

      • startRound

        public void startRound()
        Method to begin the enemy attacks. Once the round starts, users cannot place new towers, enemies are created and moved. Once all enemies have been defeated, the game phase swaps back into placing towers, the round increases, and the number of enemies in the next round increases.

      • createEnemy

        public void createEnemy​(int randomEnemy)
        Method to create an enemy. The type of enemy is determined by a random number generated when this function is called, and adds this new enemy to the enemy list.
        Parameters:
        randomEnemy - - specifies the type of enemy to create

      • moveEnemies

        public void moveEnemies()
        Method to move enemies along the road, as long as the user is alive and the given enemy is alive

      • findNext

        public void findNext​(Enemy e)
        Method to find the next position to move an enemy to. The enemies will continue to find a new next until they are dead or have reached the end of the board
        Parameters:
        e - - current enemy to find the next for

      • getRoad

        public Road getRoad()
        Getter to return the road in the model
        Returns:
        the road used in the model

      • getTowerMap

        public Tower[][] getTowerMap()
        Method to return the tower map in the model
        Returns:
        the 2D tower map array

      • addTower

        public void addTower​(Tower currTowerClicked,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        Method to add a tower at the given x and y values. Towers can only be placed if the tower is properly initialized and there are no towers at that point and it is not part of the road and the game is in the place phase.
        Parameters:
        currTowerClicked - - tower object to be placed
        x - - x coordinate to place the tower
        y - - y coordinate to place the tower

      • towerAtPosition

        public boolean towerAtPosition​(int x,
                               int y)
        Method to check if there is a tower at a given point in the tower map
        Parameters:
        x - - x value to check for a tower
        y - - y value to check for a tower
        Returns:
        true if there is a tower, false otherwise

      • getTowerAtPost

        public Tower getTowerAtPost​(int x,
                            int y)
        Method to return the tower object at a given point
        Parameters:
        x - - x value to get the tower from
        y - - y value to get the tower from
        Returns:
        the tower at the given position

      • removeTower

        public void removeTower​(Tower currTowerClicked,
                        int x,
                        int y)
        Method to remove the current tower object from the tower map, meaning it has been sold
        Parameters:
        currTowerClicked - - tower object to be removed
        x - - x value to remove the tower from
        y - - y value to remove the tower from

      • removeTowerNetwork

        public void removeTowerNetwork​(int x,
                               int y)
        This method removes towers from the other game in a networked game
        Parameters:
        x - An int of the x value of the tower
        y - An int of the y value of the tower

        public int getMoney()
        Getter to get the user's money
        Returns:
        the money

        Method for the user to lose health

        Parameters:

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        getter method to get the health of the user
        Returns:
        the user's health

      • towerAttack

        public void towerAttack()
        Method to process all of the possible tower attacks. The function loops through the tower map to find all of the towers, then loops through the enemies to see if any enemies are touching the towers, and if they are, they are attacked.

      • setMoney

        public void setMoney​(int amount)
        Setter to set the user's money
        Parameters:
        amount - - amount to set the money to
